author: paulhauner
content:
This is a known issue with Eth2 presently. I’ve spoken about it in this channel, I link to it afterwards.

Basically block propagation is (unnecessarily IMO) slow at the moment which is causing blocks to arrive after attestations are sent out. 

An oversight in the Eth2 spec means that these late blocks don’t get attested to but they still end up in the chain, causing a missed head vote.
